name: Azorius Arrester
oracle_text: When Azorius Arrester enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
flavor_text: "You have the right to remain silent. Mostly because I tire of your excuses."

name: Azorius Chancery
oracle_text:
Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield tapped.
When Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {W}{U}.

name: Azorius Guildgate
oracle_text:
Azorius Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
flavor_text: Enter the Senate, the seat of justice and the foundation of Ravnican society.

name: Azorius Signet
flavor_text: The maze-like design embodies the core of Azorius law—strict structure designed to test wills and stall change.

name: Band Together
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures you control each deal damage equal to their power to another target creature.
flavor_text: In times of peril, the vision the ancient paruns had for their city comes into focus.

name: Basilica Screecher
oracle_text:
Flying
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
flavor_text: A screech in the night is all it takes for Orzhov debtors to clutch at their coin purses.

name: Blade Juggler
oracle_text:
Spectacle {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
When Blade Juggler enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.

name: Boros Garrison
oracle_text:
Boros Garrison enters the battlefield tapped.
When Boros Garrison enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {R}{W}.

name: Boros Guildgate
oracle_text:
Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
flavor_text:
"It is our duty to protect all those in need. But the other guilds have never shown themselves worthy of that protection."
—Tajic

name: Boros Signet
flavor_text:
"Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size—a weight of strength and of pride."
—Agrus Kos

name: Chainwhip Cyclops
oracle_text: {3}{R}: Target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"You say this Tenth District, not Rubblebelt. But where smash happen, that Rubblebelt. Rubblebelt state of mind."
—Urgdar, cyclops philosopher

name: Cloudkin Seer
oracle_text:
Flying
When Cloudkin Seer enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: "I can see which way the wind is blowing."

name: Consider
oracle_text:
Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Ivold gasped in surprise. Either a very strange insect had crawled onto one of the lenses or he was seeing geists at last!

name: Corpse Churn
oracle_text: Mill three cards, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: "How did we find each other? So there I was, exploring a mound of monster corpses..."

name: Cosmotronic Wave
oracle_text: Cosmotronic Wave deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control. Creatures your opponents control can't block this turn.
flavor_text: "This sort of innovation occurs when you set out to improve an electric tea kettle and misplace a decimal."

name: Curse of Chains
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of each upkeep, tap enchanted creature.
flavor_text: The giant's real punishment was the fleeting moment when he was allowed to stand before being dragged down to his knees again.

name: Deadly Dispute
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Draw two cards and create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: "That's a pretty ring! Trade you my knife for it."

name: Deadly Riposte
oracle_text: Deadly Riposte deals 3 damage to target tapped creature and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"Automatons are fast, precise, and tireless, but they all share one weakness: predictability. Learn their patterns. Strike when they're vulnerable."
—Horance, Urzan general

name: Deal Gone Bad
oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Target player mills three cards. (They put the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.)
flavor_text:
"Feed the rumor mills with delicious treachery. Bad blood between those two is a good deal for us."
—Kamiz, Obscura Oculus

name: Deputized Protester
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)
flavor_text: Butcher's training, warrior's heart.

name: Dimir Aqueduct
oracle_text:
Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield tapped.
When Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {U}{B}.

name: Dimir Guildgate
oracle_text:
Dimir Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
flavor_text: In the cold corridors of the undercity, misinformation unfurls from Duskmantle like a spreading stain.

name: Dimir Signet
flavor_text: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members—and the doomed.

name: Direct Current
oracle_text:
Direct Current deals 2 damage to any target.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

name: Doomed Traveler
oracle_text: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor_text: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

name: Duskshell Crawler
oracle_text:
When Duskshell Crawler enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
flavor_text: They often perch on street lamps, causing the poles to buckle under their weight.

name: Enforcer Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"A company of infantry is trapped behind the lines. We need to strike hard and fast to free them, or the casualties will be horrific. Send the griffins."
—Tajic

name: Erratic Visionary
oracle_text: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: An Izzet experiment begins with a "what if," gets approved with a "why not," and concludes with a "eureka!"

name: Fire Urchin
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Fire Urchin gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Rain runoff in the Smelting District is known to spontaneously burst into flame.

name: Fleshbag Marauder
oracle_text: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.

name: Footlight Fiend
oracle_text: When Footlight Fiend dies, it deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"This footlight's broken. Get me a stagehand!"
—Judith

name: Fresh-Faced Recruit
oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, Fresh-Faced Recruit has first strike.
flavor_text:
"Hold on to your ideals. They'll be tested more than your armor or the edge of your blade."
—Tajic

name: Frostburn Weird
oracle_text: {U/R}: Frostburn Weird gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Many chemisters are oblivious to the innumerable machinations of their guild, instead focusing obsessively on creating the perfect weird.

name: Gift of Strength
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"When the sky screams, when the ground groans, the End-Raze will soon begin."
—Nikya of the Old Ways

name: Goblin Wizardry
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin Wizard creature tokens with prowess. (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, they get +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: "Quiet in the library" soon gave way to larger concerns.

name: Gods Willing
oracle_text:
Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.)
Scry 1.
flavor_text: Honor the gods of Theros, and they will return the favor.

name: Golgari Guildgate
oracle_text:
Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
flavor_text: Every part of the gate was reclaimed from forgotten ruins and imbued with new purpose by the Swarm.

oracle_text:
Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield tapped.
When Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {B}{G}.

name: Golgari Signet

oracle_text:
Flying

name: Gravel-Hide Goblin
oracle_text: {3}{G}: Gravel-Hide Goblin gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"No peace accord will save Ravnica. You don't build on rot. You burn it down and start again."
—Domri Rade

name: Gruul Guildgate
oracle_text:
Gruul Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
flavor_text: Enter and leave the shackles of society behind.

flavor_text: Gruul territorial markings need not be legible. The blood, snot, and muck used to smear them are unmistakably Gruul.

name: Gruul Turf
oracle_text:
Gruul Turf enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {R}{G}.

Graft 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
{1}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains flying until end of turn.

name: Ivy Lane Denizen
oracle_text: Whenever another green creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

name: Izzet Boilerworks
oracle_text:
Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield tapped.

Izzet Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.

flavor_text: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.

name: Jeering Homunculus
oracle_text: When Jeering Homunculus enters the battlefield, you may goad target creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
flavor_text: Mklthd had always hated crowds . . . and they had always hated him.

name: Kraul Warrior
oracle_text: {5}{G}: Kraul Warrior gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The insectile kraul lurk in the tunnels below street level. Many are loyal to the Golgari Swarm, but others follow their own esoteric caste system.

name: Krenko's Command
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor_text: Krenko's hirelings are unflinchingly loyal.

name: Kronch Wrangler
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Kronch Wrangler.
flavor_text: Looking over two city blocks of destruction, he could only cackle with pride.

name: Law-Rune Enforcer
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Tap target creature with mana value 2 or greater.
flavor_text:
"See that no one enters or leaves New Prahv today. And notify me at once of any Planeswalker activity."
—Dovin Baan

name: Leapfrog
oracle_text: Leapfrog has flying as long as you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.
flavor_text:
"Most compete for insects at street level. Some dwell near Izzet laboratories and ride the thermal updrafts."

Enchant creature

Whenever enchanted creature attacks, each other creature that's attacking one of your opponents gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
{2}{B}: Masked Blackguard gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Her footsteps are whispers, her passage a last breath.

name: Mighty Leap
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

"The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly."
—Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

name: Ornery Goblin
oracle_text: Whenever Ornery Goblin blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Ornery Goblin deals 1 damage to that creature.

Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

name: Passwall Adept
oracle_text: {2}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

oracle_text: Haste

name: Rakdos Signet
flavor_text: Made of bone and boiled in blood, a Rakdos signet is not considered finished until it has been used as a murder weapon.

name: Rakdos Trumpeter
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{3}{R}: Rakdos Trumpeter gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The louder their performance, the quieter we become in comparison. They are the perfect distractions, for only fools ignore the Rakdos."

name: Reduce to Ashes

name: Repeal
oracle_text:
Return target nonland permanent with mana value X to its owner's hand.

flavor_text:

name: Ripscale Predator
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

name: Roaming Ghostlight
oracle_text:
Flying
When Roaming Ghostlight enters the battlefield, return up to one target non-Spirit creature to its owner's hand.

name: Roofstalker Wight
oracle_text: {1}{U}: Roofstalker Wight gains flying until end of turn.

name: Rootborn Defenses

Defender

Enchant creature

name: Simic Signet

name: Skitter Eel

flavor_text:
"Life has no mistakes, only experiments."
—Yolov, Simic bioengineer

name: Snakeform

Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a green Snake with base power and toughness 1/1.

name: Spellgorger Weird
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Spellgorger Weird.

name: Steeple Creeper

flavor_text:
"If the Fin Clade cannot produce a reliable venomous krasis, mobile in both air and water, then the Guardian Project will absorb its resources."

name: Syndicate Enforcer
oracle_text: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

Flying

Flying

name: Tithebearer Giant

Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

name: Twilight Panther

Flying

Deathtouch

name: Vernadi Shieldmate

flavor_text: "Selesnya's soil is sacred, and you're about to meet it with your face."

name: Vines of the Recluse

name: Vizkopa Vampire
oracle_text: Lifelink
flavor_text: Orzhov vampires look for allies in unlikely places in case their new guildmaster turns on them. The fate of the Obzedat is proof of Kaya's power and her hatred of the living dead.

name: War Screecher
oracle_text:
Flying
{5}{W}, {T}: Other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Soaring over Vitu-Ghazi, New Prahv, and Orzhova, the Conclave's trained falcons provided critical intelligence.

name: Watcher in the Mist
oracle_text:
Flying
When Watcher in the Mist enters the battlefield, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

name: Whisper Agent
oracle_text:
Flash
When Whisper Agent enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: He has a job to finish, and it's you.

name: Wildsize
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Two times the size, four times the smell.

name: Wildwood Patrol
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text: If you're lucky, the centaurs will give a single warning to leave their territory before driving a spear into you. If you're unlucky, the spear is the warning.

name: Wojek Bodyguard
oracle_text:
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
Wojek Bodyguard can't attack or block alone.
flavor_text: "By all means, take another step toward the captain."

name: Yeva's Forcemage
oracle_text: When Yeva's Forcemage enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Nature can't be stopped. It rips and tears at Ravnica's tallest buildings to claim its place in the sun."
